survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with AI-Powered Personal Chef Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and preferences regarding AI-powered personal chef services, focusing on usability, customization, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered personal chef services?
questions.client_notes: Helps segment users by engagement level. Consider adding a follow-up question for first-time users to understand initial impressions.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered personal chef services?

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in an AI-powered personal chef service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Identifies key features driving satisfaction. Useful for prioritizing future updates.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes with a limit of 3 selections.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in an AI-powered personal chef service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of meal recommendations provided by the AI-powered personal chef service?
questions.routing_logic: Show if Q1 answer is not 'First-time user'
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction with a core feature.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of meal recommendations provided by the AI-powered personal chef service?
script.routing_logic: Show if Q1 answer is not 'First-time user'

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using the AI-powered personal chef service?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unanticipated issues. Useful for qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using the AI-powered personal chef service?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the AI-powered personal chef service to others?
questions.client_notes: Standard NPS-style question to gauge advocacy.
